name: Red Potan
text: You can target 1 "Potan" monster you control; it is treated as a Tuner until the end of the next turn. If a monster is Synchro Summoned while this monster is on the field: You can Special Summon 1 "Potan" monster from your hand or Deck. You can only use each effect of "Red Potan" once per turn.
